I am the founder and owner of Totale Gezondheid, a practice and advisory bureau dedicated to promoting holistic health and well-being. With a background in psychology, sports science, and philosophy, I combine my extensive knowledge and experience to offer curative, preventive, and performance-oriented therapy programs.

# Education:
Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam: Candidate Doctor of Philosophy (PhD) in Applied Psychology. My PhD thesis, “Mindfulness-Based Body Movement Reprocessing,” is currently in progress.

University Utrecht: Movement Science (MSc, 1992) and Clinical/Healthpsychology (MSc., 1995)

# Professional Experience:
Owner and CEO of Totale Gezondheid (2011 - Present): Specializing in EMDR, Buddhist Psychology, and integrative health practices. Writer and CEO of Total Health Foundation (2007 - Present): Focused on writing and leading the foundation.

# Skills:
Mindfulness, EMDR, Buddhist Psychology, Sports and Exercise Science, Psychotherapy and Coaching

# Languages:
Dutch (native language)
German (Professional Working Proficiency)
English (Professional Working Proficiency)

# Mission
My mission is to help individuals achieve a balanced and fulfilling life through a combination of physical and mental health practices. Whether you are seeking therapy, coaching, or training, Totale Gezondheid is here to support you on your journey to total health.

# Connect with Edward
For more information or to schedule a consultation, visit www.totalegezondheid.nl or contact me via the contact page.

Let’s embark on this journey to total health together.
